title: Digimon Card App
description: For my SIT second year project my group created a moblie app that allowed users manage their collection, and search for cards and view their details.

title: Mugan Trial
description: Mugan Trial was my second year group game project. It's a 2D rougelike topdown shooter with randomly generated levels.

title: PROJECT TANK
description: This is my current third year game project. It is a 3D survival horror with heavy inspiration from PS1 games of the same genre.

title: Jade Project
description: Our team created a JADE project that managed an airports ticketing system.
